com.heroiclabs.nakama

Interface User

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Friend, GroupUser, Self
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultFriend

    public interface User
    A user in the server.

    • Method Detail

      • getAvatarUrl

        java.lang.String getAvatarUrl()
        Returns:
        A URL string which points at a avatar image or similar.

      • getCreatedAt

        long getCreatedAt()
        Returns:
        UTC timestamp when the user was created.

      • getFullname

        java.lang.String getFullname()
        Returns:
        The full name for a user.

      • getHandle

        java.lang.String getHandle()
        Returns:
        The handle (nickname) of the user.

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        Returns:
        The ID of the user.

      • getLang

        java.lang.String getLang()
        Returns:
        The (BCP-47) lang tag set by the user.

      • getLastOnlineAt

        long getLastOnlineAt()
        Returns:
        UTC timestamp when the user was last online.

      • getLocation

        java.lang.String getLocation()
        Returns:
        The location set by the user.

      • getMetadata

        java.lang.String getMetadata()
        Returns:
        The metadata stored for the user.

      • getMetadata

        <T> T getMetadata(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Type Parameters:
        T - A type parameter for the metadata to decode.
        Parameters:
        clazz - A hint for the type of the class.
        Returns:
        The decoded metadata for the user.

      • getTimezone

        java.lang.String getTimezone()
        Returns:
        The timezone set by the user.

      • getUpdatedAt

        long getUpdatedAt()
        Returns:
        UTC timestamp when the user was updated.
